name: Sushi Neko
description:
Collect sushi seeds and grow sushi, and discover new sushi recipes with the help of your trusty  watergun and friendly mochi cat! But watch out for the neighbor's cat - its after your sushi plants!

This game was originally posted as a submission for the 2019 Global Game Jam.

Credits: 

Steph Ng - Game Programmer

Bethany Lai - Game Programmer

Carys Gooi - Music

Ah-Young Joo - 3D Artist

Xin Yi Lin - Environmental Artist

Jack Bailey - Environmental Artist
